plan_context.query: Write a short note on how fast quantum computers currently are. It should be one paragraph and in the style of lecture notes.and write it onto a notion page called quantum

steps.task: Search for information on how fast quantum computers currently are.
Compose a short note in one paragraph and in the style of lecture notes on the current speed of quantum computers using the information obtained from the search.

inputs.name: $quantum_search
inputs.description: Search results on how fast quantum computers currently are

steps.task: Write the composed note onto a notion page called quantum.

inputs.name: $composed_note
inputs.description: The note on how fast quantum computers currently are written in lecture note style
